  <title>as1170windzones</title>
  <abstract>This dataset provides geospatial representation of the Australian wind regions defined in Australia Standards/New Zealand Standards (AS/NZS) 1170.2 (2021) Structural Design Actions Part 2: wind actions (hereafter “Standard”). The dataset is intended to assist in delineating areas for referencing the Standard – for example in assigning building vulnerability models across the country. 
In the event of any inconsistency between this dataset and Figure 3.1 in the Standard, the Standard will take precedence. This product has not been formally endorsed by Standards Australia or the relevant Working Groups and subcommittees. References to localities are indicative and use the best available information at the time of production.

This dataset providesgeospatial representation of the Australian wind regions defined in Australian Standards/New Zealand Standards 1170.2 (2021) Structural Design Actions Part 2: wind actions (the "Standard"). The dataset is intended to assist in delineating areas for referencing the Standard - for example in assigning building vulnerability models across the country.</abstract>
